subject: Re: new to group, questions
author: Misty
full_text:
Richard,

Thats a great example and a good way to look at things. the old idea 
that energy doesnt die its just transformed holds true with that too. 
I have seen the same thing done with missing appendages, tho a finger 
may have been removed it still registers under kirlian photography as 
its energy being present.

Just because we dont see something or hear a thing doesnt mean it is 
nonexistant =) Perhaps it just means we are deaf and blind to its 
existence.

Misty


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "shortbuff" <rdmc512@...> wrote:
>
> Thanks for replying to my message.
> 
> Years ago I watched a slide show featuring several photo's taken via
> kirlian photography. It seems kirlian photography captures certain
> types of energy on film. In the demonstration a picture of a house 
was
> shown. Later that same house had a fire and part of the house had 
been
> burned to the ground but the photo taken with kirlian photography
> later showed that part of the house still there.
> 
> I'm no expert but maybe energy we can't see leaves an imprint in the
> non physical universe and can be viewed or demonstrated using the
> right instruments and technique. Of course I really have no clue and
> am fascinated by the evp and itc phenomena.
> 
> Enjoyed visiting your site, thanks for the link.
> 
> Richard
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Chad" <cawiggins78@> wrote:
> >
> > Hi Richard, and welcome to the group. I am not on here much as I
> > usually just read the posts and contribute when I can. I am very 
busy
> > with my group so balancing my time isn't easy.
> > 
> > I guess as of now it is hard to say whether or not an EVP is from 
a
> > "living" entity or just a sound bit floating in time. All we can 
do is
> > speculate on such matters, really. I think that time may lead to
> > finite answers to our questions, but as it stands with our limited
> > equipment and devices we use to measure phenomenon, we cannot say 
100%
> > for certain. I have my theories, as does everyone.
> > 
> > That being said, my personal belief is that EVP and ITC can be 
both.
> > Though my research has been much more focused on EVP and 
recently, on
> > the Radio Shack hack box, I have seen what I believe to be 
evidence of
> > both. I have many EVPs recorded that seem to suggest both "living"
> > entities and those that suggest residual phenomenon, or "residue" 
of
> > things in the past.
> > 
> > One example is the EVP I captured at the Camp Creek Trustle in
> > McDonough, GA. In the EVP, the voice picked up seems to suggest 
that
> > he is not dead. Tou can check this file out in my folder here. 
Also,
> > at the investigation of the trustle, EVPs were picked up seeming 
to
> > answer questions. For example, when I asked what kind of music was
> > enjoyed by the entity, I received "orcha" as an response. I took 
this
> > to be an attempt to say "orchestra," a popular music choice from 
the
> > early 1900's when so many lives were lost at this spot. As for the
> > Radio Shack hack, just last night I was again at the trustle
> > conducting a hack box session. When we asked about which of us 
were in
> > attendance, the answer came back very clearly with two of our 
names,
> > "Nate" and "Chad." These were very clear and in an area where 
radio
> > reception is not that great.
> > 
> > Perhaps one of our more compelling EVPs as they relate to whether 
or
> > not these are "living" entities we are communicating with is one 
that
> > we recorded in the White House located in McDonough, GA. A team 
member
> > was talking about someone and how poorly they kept up their yard 
when
> > we picked up a very clear voice saying "You are so mean." On the 
same
> > investigation we captured a voice talking about Kurt, another
> > investigator and how he was stupid.
> > 
> > Now to the other side of the coin. We have picked up "EVPs" of 
things
> > such as gunshots and cannon fire at civil war battlefields we have
> > visited. These appear at first to be residual sounds, yet other
> > aspects of the investigation seem to provide proof of intelligent
> > entities. Perhaps the soldiers who died in that battle are still
> > fighting. We cannot really say based on only the EVPs taken during
> > those investigations. We do have other evidence, but I will not go
> > into that here as this is an EVP/ITC group.
> > 
> > Feel free to take a look at our group's site.
> > www.georgiastateparanormal.com
> > 
> > I am happy to send our files to anyone for research purposes if
> requested.
> > 
> > I am sure that many of the members of the group will give you 
their
> > theories as well on this matter, and I'm sure that as you begin to
> > experiment on your own that many fascinating and unexplained 
events
> > will present themselves to you. Good luck, and again, welcome to 
the
> > group.
> > 
> > Chad
> >
>
